overview_of_class: Second course of a sequence designed to develop writing skills and structures through analysis of socially-committed art. Emphasis on cultural analysis and development of longer essays.
name: Reading and Writing the Art of Protest
title: WCAS SPANISH 204-0-21 Reading and Writing the Art of Protest
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Second course of a sequence designed to develop writing skills and structures through analysis of socially-committed art. Emphasis on cultural analysis and development of longer essays.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Three class meetings a week
Prerequisite: 203 or 207

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: SPANISH
